                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Revolution and its sizzling Economic Revolution. But you haven&#039;t heard about 
its other great social upheaval - the Chinese Sexual Revolution - and like 
everything in that country it&#039;s happening at warp speed.

It&#039;s China&#039;s version of the 60s revolution - on steroids.

CHINA&#039;S SEXUAL REVOLUTION is the world&#039;s first glimpse - often using secret 
cameras - into this forbidden new China. It&#039;s a surprising portrait of the 
Chinese today: the new free love generation that&#039;s left their parents in shock; 
the booming sex industry that&#039;s creating an HIV crisis; the new generation of 
career women and feminists that suddenly wants it all - while millions of men 
feel left out.

This long untold story goes back to the days of Chairman Mao, who made 
sexuality a great taboo. He ordered everyone to wear unisexual Mao suits, and 
forbid women from wearing sexy clothing, getting stylish haircuts, or even 
wearing make-up. Men and women were expected to be comrades - not lovers - 
though Mao himself enjoyed an emperor&#039;s sex life, seeking virgins to retain his 
"youthÃƒÂ¶.

China&#039;s sexual libido was bottled up for 50 years, but now itÃƒâ€ s bursting loose, 
with dramatic effects on marriage, personal freedom and the government itself.
